column5: Our dinner will be held Sunday with our family,but getting a head start always help control the mess and caous.There will be a big pot of jigs diiner boiling  sunday morning. I have been told no picking at it.YA RIGHT.              For those that opened this thread,warned ya.

Debbe tried crock pot stuffing last year...man does it turn out good. And Debbe always had great stuffing before trying this.Great time saver and now we can have stuffing even if we don't have a bird with it. Only downside is I AM PICKING at it ALL the time. It's about 1/3 gone before it gets anywhere near the table. As a matter of fact that is what I am doing right now...supervising the crock pot to ensure a quality product for Xmas dinner tonight  BTW nice looking bird you got going there.
Ya, you warned me but I looked anyway.  Bon appetite my friend, Merry Christmas.
I pick so much come dinner time,Im stuff.LOL  Thanks Chris.
ours JUST went on the BBQ right now!!!!  Looks good Brian...Bon Appetite!!

Just so ya all know.I will be carving it up and putting into a bakeing dish. It will be smoothered with savory gravy, then popped into the oven to warm up sunday.  I gotz to see pics of your BBQ turkey  Twocoda .

we havent had a turkey (on any occasion) in the oven in about 6 years....always on the spit over the BBQ or every once in while deep fried ...  i would post pics but its way beyond me at this point of my soberbilities...cheers
If I hadn't have just ate one.. id be jealous... burrrrpppp...
Happy Holidays Brian!  You wanna go deer hunting one day this week?  I booked the week off and still have a tag to fill.  Plan on going every day!  PM me if you want..
